text: ( Source : United States Attorney's Office for the District of New Mexico ) ALBUQUERQUE - Kevin Hawkins , 50, of San Bernardino , Calif. , pleaded guilty today in federal court in Albuquerque, N.M. , to a methamphetamine trafficking charge. Under
